an6.31:1.1: “These six things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an6.31:1.3: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They don’t guard the sense doors, and they eat too much.
an6.31:1.4: These six things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an6.31:2.1: These six things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an6.31:2.3: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. They guard the sense doors, and they don’t eat too much.
an6.31:2.4: These six things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
